title: New patch and again this lag from the client
body: Is the same bug  like last in Eune in Bulgariq this time it cant fix.

replies.body: EUNE has been experience ISP issues recently, especially around Bulgaria and surrounding areas.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can see if we can find some options for you.  We'll see you there!
